```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(macleish)
```
```{r, eval = FALSE}
url <- "http://download.massgis.digital.mass.gov/shapefiles/state/contours250k.zip"
local_file <- basename(url)
download.file(url, destfile = local_file)
unzip(local_file, exdir = "contours250k")
```
